titleStmt.title: Certaine briefe questions and answers, concerning chiefe poynts of Christian religion Gathered for the vse of the young people of the parish of S. Andrewes in Eastcheape: and may serue generally for all places. By N.A.
titleStmt.author: Allsopp, Nicholas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. Jones] for T. P[avier.,
